description:
Fans have been eagerly waiting for developments on the next Avengers movie. The new movie is set to be released prior to Avengers: Secret Wars. Now, after many rumors and development changes, it’s been confirmed that the next title will be Avengers: Doomsday. Additionally, actor Robert Downey Jr. will return to the MCU to portray [...]

The post ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ To Star Robert Downey Jr. As Doctor Doom appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ To Star Robert Downey Jr. As Doctor Doom
